result.arabic_text: إِلَّا رَحۡمَةٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ إِنَّ فَضۡلَهُۥ كَانَ عَلَيۡكَ كَبِيرٗا
result.translation: Ariko rero Imana yawe Rurema Allah Yarakugiriye impuhwe, maze Itsimbataza Qor’ani mu mushaha wawe. Mu vy’ukuri, impano zayo kuri wewe zamye ari nta ngere[361].
result.footnotes: [361] Zimwe mu ngabirano Imana Allah Yahaye Intumwa Muhamadi (nyakugira amahoro n’impuhwe z’Imana Allah), ni uko Yayihaye Qor’ani ntagatifu, Iyigenera igihagararo kizoshimwa n’ibiremwa ku musi w’izuka, n’ibindi rero Itigeze Iha n’umwe mu biremwa.
